verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> If a woman כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> When תַזְרִ֔יעַ <S%H2232><s%> have conceived seed וְיָלְדָ֖ה <S%H3205><s%> and born זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> a man child וְטָֽמְאָה֙ <S%H2930><s%> then she shall be unclean שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> seven יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days כִּימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> according to the days נִדַּ֥ת <S%H5079><s%> of the separation דְּוֹתָ֖הּ <S%H1738><s%> for her infirmity תִּטְמָֽא׃ <S%H2930><s%> shall she be unclean
וּבַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁמִינִ֑י <S%H8066><s%> And in the eighth יִמּ֖וֹל <S%H4135><s%> shall be circumcised בְּשַׂ֥ר <S%H1320><s%> the flesh עָרְלָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H6190><s%> of his foreskin

וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֥ים <S%H7970><s%> and thirty יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וּשְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <S%H7969><s%> three יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> the days תֵּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> And she shall then continue בִּדְמֵ֣י <S%H1818><s%> in the blood טָהֳרָ֑ה <S%H2893><s%> of her purifying בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> any קֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> no hallowed לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגָּ֗ע <S%H5060><s%> she shall touch וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמִּקְדָּשׁ֙ <S%H4720><s%> into the sanctuary לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תָבֹ֔א <S%H935><s%> thing nor come עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until מְלֹ֖את <S%H4390><s%> be fulfilled יְמֵ֥י <S%H3117><s%> the days טָהֳרָֽהּ׃ <S%H2893><s%> of purification

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if נְקֵבָ֣ה <S%H5347><s%> a maid child תֵלֵ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> But if she bear וְטָמְאָ֥ה <S%H2930><s%> then she shall be unclean שְׁבֻעַ֖יִם <S%H7620><s%> two weeks כְּנִדָּתָ֑הּ <S%H5079><s%> as in her separation וְשִׁשִּׁ֥ים <S%H8346><s%> threescore יוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> days וְשֵׁ֣שֶׁת <S%H8337><s%> and six יָמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> days תֵּשֵׁ֖ב <S%H3427><s%> and she shall continue עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in דְּמֵ֥י <S%H1818><s%> in the blood טָהֳרָֽה׃ <S%H2893><s%> of her purifying

וּבִמְלֹ֣את ׀ <S%H4390><s%> are fulfilled יְמֵ֣י <S%H3117><s%> And when the days טָהֳרָ֗הּ <S%H2893><s%> is cleansed לְבֵן֮ <S%H1121><s%> for a son א֣וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לְבַת֒ <S%H1323><s%> or for a daughter תָּבִ֞יא <S%H935><s%> she shall bring כֶּ֤בֶשׂ <S%H3532><s%> a lamb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the first שְׁנָתוֹ֙ <S%H8141><s%> year לְעֹלָ֔ה <S%H5930><s%> for a burnt offering וּבֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> and a young יוֹנָ֥ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeon אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or תֹ֖ר <S%H8449><s%> or a turtledove לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> unto the priest

וְהִקְרִיב֞וֹ <S%H7126><s%> Who shall offer לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> it before יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וְכִפֶּ֣ר <S%H3722><s%> and make an atonement עָלֶ֔יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and וְטָהֲרָ֖ה <S%H2891><s%> for her and she shall be cleansed מִמְּקֹ֣ר <S%H4726><s%> from the issue דָּמֶ֑יהָ <S%H1818><s%> of her blood זֹ֤את <S%H2063><s%> likewise תּוֹרַת֙ <S%H8451><s%> This [is] the law הַיֹּלֶ֔דֶת <S%H3205><s%> for her that hath born לַזָּכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> a male א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> or לַנְּקֵבָֽה׃ <S%H5347><s%> or a female

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> if לֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> cannot תִמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> be able יָדָהּ֮ <S%H3027><s%> able דֵּ֣י <S%H1767><s%> able שֶׂה֒ <S%H7716><s%> a lamb וְלָקְחָ֣ה <S%H3947><s%> then she shall bring שְׁתֵּֽי־ <S%H8147><s%> two תֹרִ֗ים <S%H8449><s%> turtles א֤וֹ <S%H176><s%> or שְׁנֵי֙ <S%H8147><s%> two בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> or two young יוֹנָ֔ה <S%H3123><s%> pigeons אֶחָ֥ד <S%H259><s%> the one לְעֹלָ֖ה <S%H5930><s%> for the burnt offering וְאֶחָ֣ד <S%H259><s%> and the other לְחַטָּ֑את <S%H2403><s%> for a sin offering וְכִפֶּ֥ר <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלֶ֛יהָ <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <S%H3548><s%> and the priest וְטָהֵֽרָה׃ <S%H2891><s%> for her and she shall be clean פ
